content.question: Which choice best supports an interpretation that like the child, the adult narrator feels compelled to speculate about his mother?

choices.label: “Courage alone could not get me past that heavy door” (paragraph 4)
“the metaphors of her faith were also the metaphors of medicine” (paragraph 5)

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
